resources.string: It is popular in many countries and is prepared in various forms as a sweet snack that can be homemade or purchased in bakeries, supermarkets, food stalls, and franchised specialty vendors.*Doughnut* is the traditional spelling, whilst *donut* is the simplified version. Both terms are often used interchangeably in the English-language.
The Best (and Easiest) Ice Cream You’ll Ever Make
Rich and creamy homemade vanilla ice cream recipe that only requires five ingredients!
Who says dessert can’t be healthy? Blend your way to the ultimate recipe for 5-Minute Healthy Greek Frozen Yogurt made with your choice of fruit!
